title: Ursula

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Have another player sign their voice away for a day, blackmailing them.
- For 3 Malice, sabotage a random visitor to another player's action, causing it to fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Malice will be refunded if your target does not receive any visitors, or they are unable to be visited (I.E, jailed)

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- Your contracts now last for three days.
- You will now learn the name of the visitor you sabotaged.

desc:
Post 5423
*"The sea and all its spoils bow to my power!"*
